DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare efficacy intervention attention control group produce change diabetes self-management , A1C health relate quality life Hispanics type 2 diabetes . Hypothesis : The experimental group receive 8 week intervention program show significantly great improvement attention control group 1 6 month intervention : behavioral influence diabetes knowledge , diabetes self-efficacy , family support , outcomes self-reported management diabetes ( physical activity , diet , medication , glucose monitoring ) , A1C level , psychological outcome health-related quality life .
DOC.brief_title: A Family-Based Diabetes Intervention Hispanic Adults Emerging Community
DOC.detailed_description: A total 156 participant recruit , 78 experimental group ( 39 participant diabetes 39 family member ) 78 attention control group ( 39 participant diabetes 39 family member ) . This allow estimate attrition 10 % group . An intervention consist eight weekly interactive module , total 12 hour , base module National Standards Diabetes Self-Management Education , National Diabetes Education Program . Data collect baseline , immediately post-intervention , 3 6 month follow-up visit .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria participant : 1 . Communitydwelling 2 . Selfidentification Hispanic 3 . Age 18 year old 4 . Selfidentification medical diagnosis type 2 diabetes 5 . An adult family member willing participate study . 6 . Must able speak either English Spanish Inclusion criterion family members/relatives : 1 . Family member 18 2 . Reside household participant diabetes 3 . Must able speak either English Spanish We exclude Hispanic adult family member : 1. diagnose type 1 diabetes 2. report prior ( within past year ) current participation diabetes selfmanagement intervention program 3. cognitively impaired ( oriented time , place , person , know dementia ) 4 . Pregnant time T1 ( baseline ) data collection
